Name: Golu sharma
Medicines: Use prescribed antimalarials (e.g., ACTs) and paracetamol for fever; consult a doctor immediately
Yoga: Gentle breathing (Anulom Vilom, Bhramari) and restorative poses after fever subsides
Diet: Hydrating, easily digestible foods like khichdi, soups, fruits, vegetables; avoid oily/heavy foods
Advice: Rest well, monitor symptoms closely, and seek emergency care if severe symptoms appear

Name: Aastha Sharma
Medicines: Lubricating eye drops, antibiotics if bacterial

Name: Dinesh Kartik
Advice: Rest, avoid contaminated food, maintain hygiene

Name: Manish Gangil
Medicines: No specific antiviral; use paracetamol for fever/pain (avoid NSAIDs like ibuprofen/aspirin)
Yoga: Gentle breathing and restorative poses after fever subsides; avoid strenuous asanas
Diet: Hydrating with water, coconut water, clear soups, fruits; avoid oily, spicy, and heavy foods
Advice: Rest, monitor platelet count, stay hydrated, and seek medical care if bleeding or severe symptoms occur

Name: Pratyush Chauhan
Advice: Rest and avoid contact with others

Name: Sumit Dhariwal
Diet: Avoid allergens, eat omega-3 rich foods
